trans-unit.source: Provides access to add attributes for one specific type to one specific <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable"></xref>.

The first time an <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable> is queried for attributes for a type, if the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> was populated using <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder.AddCallback%2A> for that type, the delegate is passed a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder>.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable> removes the callback reference and adds any attribute information provided by calls to <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder.AddCustomAttributes%2A>.
Adds the contents of the provided attributes to the attribute table that created this builder.
If an attribute conflicts with another attribute already included in the table, the last attribute added replaces previous attributes.
Attributes can be added only to the type specified by <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder.CallbackType%2A>.
The attributes that are added to the table.
attributes is `null`.
Adds the contents of the provided attributes to the attribute table that created this builder.
If an attribute conflicts with another attribute already included in the table, the last attribute added replaces previous attributes.
Attributes can be added only to the type specified by <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder.CallbackType%2A>.
The member to which the attributes are added.
The attributes that are added to the table.
descriptor or attributes is `null`.
Adds the contents of the provided attributes to the attribute table that created this builder.
If an attribute conflicts with another attribute already included in the table, the last attribute added replaces previous attributes.
Attributes can be added only to the type specified by <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder.CallbackType%2A>.

Attributes can be added only to the type specified by <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder.CallbackType%2A>.
The name of the member to which the attributes are added.
The attributes that are added to the table.
memberName or attributes is `null`.

If an attribute conflicts with another attribute already included in the table, the last attribute added replaces previous attributes.
Attributes can be added only to the type specified by <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder.CallbackType%2A>.
The dependency to which the attributes are added.
The attributes that are added to the table.
dp or attributes is `null`.
The type to which attributes will be added.
The type is set in the constructor and cannot be changed.
The type to which attributes will be added.
